invocations.description: Returns the last count of item itename in your inventory and equipment slots. Returns 0 if itemname is not recognized. The item does not need to be visible to count items this way.
invocations.exDescription: Will show how many 'Crystalline Arrows' you have in your inventory. Will count items in your equipment slots.

invocations.description: Returns the last count of item itename. Returns 0 if the itemname is not recognized. The item does not need to be visible to count items this way. If you pass true it will to ignoreequips it won't count your equipment slots.
invocations.exDescription:
Will show how many 'Crystalline Arrows' you have in your inventory. Will not count the ones in your equipment slots.
Warning: this feature is only available with ignoreequips in Tibia 11. For more information on Tibia 11 see this thread.
